sys_element_mapping.value: u_string_2=Check given vaccine and medical details^u_reference_1={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^assignment_group={"display":"Document Approver","value":"9a6fd2752f7f011046e755f62799b69e"}

sys_variable_value.value: Return to office date from Hi-Five consulting

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger➛Return to Office Record➛Employee➛First name  Trigger➛Return to Office Record➛Employee➛Last name, this is HR team from Hi-Five consulting 

 

This mail is regarding the date for returning office which has been decided by the onboarding team for you from the survey which has filled by you earlier. We have verified and gone through all of your medical documents. We are happy to announce that you can return to Hi-Five Consulting on 6➛Tracking Task Record➛Return Date,so be prepared and make the arrangements to board in the company on respective date.

 

Thank you 

HR Team

Hi-Five consulting 

 

If you have any queries, Kindly reply the mail for support

sys_variable_value.value: Return to office date from Hi-Five consulting

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger➛Return to Office Record➛Employee➛First name  Trigger➛Return to Office Record➛Employee➛Last name, this is HR team from Hi-Five consulting 

 

This mail is regarding the date for returning office which has been decided by the onboarding team for you from the survey which has filled by you earlier. We have verified and gone through all of your medical documents. We are happy to announce that you can return to Hi-Five Consulting on 6➛Tracking Task Record➛Return Date,so be prepared and make the arrangements to board in the company on respective date.

 

Thank you 

HR Team

Hi-Five consulting 

 

If you have any queries, Kindly reply the mail for support
u_string_2=Check given vaccine and medical details^u_reference_1={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^assignment_group={"display":"Document Approver","value":"9a6fd2752f7f011046e755f62799b69e"}
